author: Kimberly Hung
comment: I absolutely love textiles and am in desperate need of a text based watch face, so when I saw the Textile watch face, I fell in love with it! It works great! I just wish there were an option to change the wording to be Ten O' Three instead of Ten Zero Three. And for there to be clock hands in the background to go with the time, but you can't have everything, so I still love it! :)

author: Angela P
comment: Its not working. Updated android wear to 2.0 but still not showing anywhere.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content:
Hi Angela - have you tried un-installing and re-installing? Also, what watch / phone combo are you using? There are additional troubleshooting steps here: https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!topicsearchin/android-wear/watch$20face$20not$20showing$20up
Let me know if this helps?

author: steph lake
comment: These fall fashion faces are different than most of the faces I've seen out there on the play store. There is a lot of variety in this pack, so you don't feel like you have just a bunch of "one type" of style of watch faces to choose from. I personally find it good to have lots of different faces to choose from to fit my outfit or my mood or both!!!! I recommend you download these.

author: Mads Jensen
comment: Hi. After several tries it still won't show up.. I've tried reinstalling and re-syncing. Still doesn't work. Hoping for help.  Phone: One plus one (Cyanogen mod 14.1) Watch: Motorola 360

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content:
Can you let me know how long you've waited? For some reason these faces can take a little longer to appear.
Are the phone + watch up to date? 
Thank you for reaching out.

author: Tonisha Hood
comment: I reinstalled it and it never showed up in my apps to use.  I think several hours is long enough.  I'm using the fossil q founder.                                             I tried resyncing and still nothing.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Tonisha, have you tried resyncing apps on the Android Wear app? That may also help, let me know!

reply.content: Hi there - have you tried uninstalling and reinstalling? It also can sometimes take several minutes for the faces to appear. If this doesn't work, a next step could be re-starting the watch and the phone. Let us know if this works!

title: Not working

author: Jeanne Sutton
comment: Want to watch the sun rise and set over an elegant tree? Or maybe you need to remember a beach trip by loading the flamingo. If those aren't your scene, then try the textures or vertigo for fun.  These plus the simply elegant Daylight are for you!
title: Fun, and so many choices

reply.content: Hi Tamas, have you tried resyncing apps in the Android Wear app? Let me know if that helps!
